Screener.in to TradingView 📈

Effortlessly copy your screen result and analyse it in TradingView

Features:
✨ Multi-Page Scraping: Automatically collects stock symbols from all pages containing your results.
🔄 Token to Symbol Conversion: Replaces exchange tokens with actual stock symbols using a powerful API.
🏷️ Exchange Differentiation: Distinguishes between symbols listed on NSE and BSE exchanges.
📋 Clipboard Copy: Instantly copies the final list of stock symbols to your clipboard in CSV format.
🔔 User Notifications: Get real-time popup messages about scraping progress and completion.

How to Use:
1. Navigate to Screener.in 🌐
   - Open your screen.
2. Start Copying 🖱️
   - Click the extension icon in the Chrome toolbar (pro tip: pin it to your tool bar).
   - Hit the "Start Scraping" button in the popup.
3. Monitor Progress 👀
   - Watch popup messages for real-time updates on the scraping process.
4. Copy Symbols 📋
   - Once done, the extension replaces exchange tokens with symbols and copies the CSV list to your clipboard. This can be pasted directly into your TradingView watchlist.

Why You'll Love It ❤️

- Save Time: Automate the tedious process of collecting stock symbols from multiple pages.
- Easy to Use: Simple interface and seamless integration with your browsing experience.

Get Started Now! 🚀

Transform the way you power your trading. Perfect for traders, analysts, and finance enthusiasts!
